title: Live the moment as it is
content:
Why do we take pics and video ?

 I feel terrified to delete any of them. Surprised !!!

 I lived those moments, I saw those.

 Still. Sometimes it happens that we see throw device,

 cause we become too busy all time to take photos, videos, recording‚Ä¶

 Then, sit home have snacks and watch the world best resolution recording tape, pics.

 There are so many professional photographers, multimedia designers, artist ‚Ä¶

 why waste your time.

 They capture moments so well. How about that.

 Or, see the world through your eyes, mind, Understanding‚Ä¶

 I feel irritate to go anywhere with anyone most of the time.

 How could people become bored and see things so quickly,

 Others also become bored of me for sure.

 It just happened to me. Allah made it easy for me.

 Some moments I wish I could erase.

 But those all are treasures, parts of my life.

 Can‚Äôt ignore it or, hate it.

 All single parts I embrace all of me with kindness,

 let‚Äôs have a little talk among us.

 Settle down in peace.

 Looks like present me is the leader of all version‚Äôs of me.

 Adulthood/Maturity is really amazing. You learn in your own wish.

 You have choice, decision to make.

 This is totally up to you, who you are.

 Being Confident, Understanding comes, Confussion earse one by one.

 You know that‚Äôs it, so that‚Äôs it no confussion.

 No circling around being delusion.

 I hate confussion.

 I have lot to learn and gain.

 So many questions bother me all the times.

 Be patient I am there.

 May Allah bless me.

 I want to be the most childish, matured, wiser young person for all the time.

 Forever.

 No confusion, No doubt, No twist total straightforward, truth, nice.

 How much I love Allah. I love you Allah.

 I realized No one else can ever enter in my mind ever.

 I loved Allah. No one is like Allah.

 Please never be angry on me.

 Don‚Äôt leave me ever, even for a slice of second.

 I know how good you are.

 Please don‚Äôt forget me.

 Always keep me on your blessings, on your side.

 Be pleased to me.

 I wish I could meet you right now.

 But that‚Äôs your choice, you know the best.

 I have your letter though. thanks.

 How much beautiful, awesome you are ! I just love you.

title: Proof of Kinship
content: There was a conversation with a question, does a parent give a DNA test report to their child to prove that they are his parent. No question about that. We accept them as parents from birth. So the conclusion people want to prove is that you can‚Äôt ask for logic for everything. You should blindly trust and accept something you don‚Äôt understand or the other party doesn‚Äôt want to discuss. That topic really bothered me for a long time. Truly how can I know that they are my parents. But, now I do understand. That‚Äôs a relief from my Almighty Allah. I know how much peace it gives. You don‚Äôt have to know whether they are your real parents. As much as they care for you. Take care of yourself, they deserve to get treated as the parents do. Like given birth mother, and genetic father they are in the highest position. But, so many people also support us every step of life. They also become comparable to our mothers, fathers, brothers, sisters, sons, daughters, grandfathers, grandmothers, grandchildren, and uncle-aunty‚Ä¶ Actually, we all are connected. And from the acts, people prove who they are to us. We also prove ourselves who we are through our actions. Just keep sharp your brain, mind, sight, hearing‚Ä¶.. you will understand which is what. And the last wisdom, lies never stay hidden, Have faith in Allah.

title: Burden
content:
Take your goods as you can carry. I am not saying to be irresponsible. But don‚Äôt take unnecessary burden. Actually, this quote fits only some specific kinds of people. I am writing this only for those kind of people.

Some people in this world think they need to be good and be generous to everyone. But you can‚Äôt do that, can you?

I mean if people love a noble person and the worst criminal both. It will be chaos.

You can‚Äôt love good and support bad at the same time. It is a person‚Äôs own choice, how they want to represent themselves. That is totally an individual choice, an individual world, his own kingdom.

Imagine a king telling another king to be responsible and lead his own kingdom the right way. Yes, this sentence can mean many things like friendly advice for a king to another king, or warning, or declaring war.

Of course, we have so many examples of this in the real world. Children have to listen to their parents. In reality, it doesn‚Äôt happen or sometimes it is impossible. Some children listen and obey their parents and give proper respect and in this case, parents are good, friendly, and wise. It is so nice example. Who doesn‚Äôt want this in their life, right? But in our lives, we all have our own tasks and, our own challenges differently. No one gets perfect from all sides.

In this world, we all struggle. We all have our own lives and our own advantages, ease side also our own burden, challenges.

You can‚Äôt tell another person that he has an easy life. You can‚Äôt. Because it is impossible. If you do that then the thing is, you become the one who wants to flee from your own tasks and challenges and regret seeing some specific benefits that others get, you just want those benefits not exchanging your whole life with anyone.

Yes, as we get tasks and challenges. we have also given necessary equipment some useful, some burdens‚Ä¶..

You know what, you have to solve your problem yourself. There is no one there who will get your job done. If they would do that, that would be their job done, not yours deed.

title: Love
content:
Love, that‚Äôs the most beautiful treasure in life.

It‚Äôs like a movie or drama or magical things‚Ä¶ Where your all consciousness wakes up. But that is not the whole view.

It makes your Nerves wake up. It will shake you up. It will make you gain so many higher degree abilities.

Whatever you sacrifice/give/invest, all will return as profit. No, lose in there. Only love.

It is the most Energetic drink which will not let you have any boring time ever.

It is the most purified, exciting adventurous journey. It makes you the best version of you.

But sometimes the Amateur lover can‚Äôt control or balance that much bigger journey/life project so they fail and then return with the wrong conclusion.

After all, even the most intelligent, wiser, brave, strong, confident, decisive, best character personality person finds it hard. And they are the ones who gain the title ‚ÄúLover‚Äù. Surprising.

Love is so wide, so precious that I can‚Äôt explain it through some words nor without a lover anyone will understand it.

But for the Lover, even silent existence will explain everything.

title: Language
content:

If I say this in the psychological language they are narcissists. If I say in the armed forces language they are traitors. In religious language hypocrite. And if I say in my language it is a total liar, weaker, coward, irritated, total head pain person.

I don‚Äôt know formal language. What I know is straightforward language. I don‚Äôt understand people. And people take me for hits like, ‚ÄúHow could you say those directly without punctuation ?‚Äù. And still, I don‚Äôt understand what just happened. And I start to explain it in more detail briefly, with more clarity. Wow, that‚Äôs the moment people blast. title: Home
content:
Where is my home ?! What‚Äôs called a home? What makes a home, a home?

sometimes people don‚Äôt get permission to enter to his own home.

title: Uniqueness
content:
You see we are human. Of course, there are so many living creatures and many things out there. But for now, I want to talk about just about us. About our identity.

There is a quote, ‚ÄúWho learned himself, he learned all too‚Äù. I don‚Äôt know if is there really any quote like that. But I believe in that. From my inside, it comes to me.

In this world, there are so many countries, so many languages, so many traditions, so many identities people‚Ä¶.. There are so many differences from person to person. But on some points, we are all the same. What ???

We are human, we are dependent, we are civilized.

As humans, we see there are three parts of our neediness, physical, mental, and soul. They are all connected to each other. All should be put into balance. Leadership is in our hands. But there are some limitations. Am I making it so much complex !? Ok, I wanna make it easy to understand.

As you see humans have limitations. In everything they have limits. For eating, for sleeping, for drinking‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. till leaving this world. No one knows which type of baby is coming and when. Or when, and how that baby will die.

Oops! Did I say something bad !? when baby is coming, cute, cuddly little baby, I am talking about his/her death. But it is true, right? How much lie decoration we do it is truth. In my opinion, every baby should know this truth at first. how he/she came to the world and there is a fixed time that will come when he/she will leave this world. Why should we do false acting to each other ?!

For getting some hope, temporary happiness-peace! Yes, I know how depressed we are, how much coward we are. We like easiness and fun. We just can be robots, going with the flow till death. But I don‚Äôt know how much it is worth it. We all want a warranty, a guarantee for every precious thing. Buying jewelry we ask if is it real, prove it. Buying real estate, cars, in business‚Ä¶.. we can do the calculation, strategies point to point every single thing. No mistake allows, Not to become betrayed, Not being a fool.

See we need proof, we do inquiry. We become furious when we get betrayed by something like that. The more precious it is, we need more proof and more investigation. But somehow most people miss this point in calculation and make the right order of preciousness from high to low. It‚Äôs ok, It‚Äôs ok, It‚Äôs totally ok üòÄ. You see you are the one who is putting self worth. No one did anything but you do it to yourself üòê. Putting yourself below the list.

We all are afraid of the truth. Yes, it is hard. And need hard work, need too much bravery, and struggle. When we are getting too much temporary happiness why will anyone go for that. There are so many options for getting temporary peace of mind, that keep us away from the truth. One is out another. Don‚Äôt worry we are here to bring happiness, and peace into your life just don‚Äôt see, don‚Äôt hear, don‚Äôt think ok.

I don‚Äôt understand, am I wrong or other people. People feel irritated, and uneasy around me. So I decided not to talk much.ü§´ Because if in case my mouth is open I just can say the truth without any punctuation signs. Like, oh I got a chance to talk, bring it on üòé. No argument in there. And I also can‚Äôt do false withdrawals, it will end up more dangerous. I will have outbursts without any control. So both sides of people should keep a safe distance as they can manage. Or if my mouth is open totally be on the truth side otherwise bring some valid authentic statement.

Let‚Äôs go back to our topic. we people have limitations on every side.

Second mental. Think of any country there are three presidents, and three of them have conflicts with each other. which situation it will be for that country? Like that, you should make a settlement with every part, and section of yourself. Yes, you are a king/queen of your own world. But just don‚Äôt go start a war with another kingdom. First, make your kingdom strong enough. Be an intelligent, kind, wise king/queen.

Third soul. All are your part. so you have to make balance and make time to listen to them, understand them, and make settlement among everything of you.

As you see in this world, in one country people make jokes of another country people how their look is, what they eat, what they wear, how they talk, every single thing‚Ä¶.. some people just understand that their eyes are made for that job, and brain is to process those. Even in between neighbors, and inside the home. All places have conflicts.

And if anyone thinks about you wrong you can‚Äôt change it, no matter how much you try. It is their decision. Already they made the decision that‚Äôs how they are.

It is really scary resting and sleeping inside of those people. It is all a circle. Come tell us we are your close one, then some console you or show their true self earlier and bully you, they will say I should ask them to help, council with them and how much life saver, helper they would be. But hold on, don‚Äôt go to a conclusion, next time you do that as they said last time how much they care for you, Now fasten your seat belt they will say why can‚Äôt I do my job by myself, they have so many works, how much pressure they are getting,‚Ä¶.. Again that point I want to detach everyone from my life, and then the statement will be, oh so you became a big knowledgeable person and no one can reach you‚Ä¶.

you know what, I am out of here. Somehow this circle should be broken. And there is no way than me. The rescuer of my own self is just me. I should not let myself be insulted no matter who the person is. God gave us same same.

No, I am not encouraging you to be reckless. I want everyone to understand who he/she is.

Why should any country‚Äôs people mock another country? Yes, there is a unique system, a unique rule. And that‚Äôs not made by me/you or he/she. The ruler should think about everyone, make justice, and give equal and unique judgment to all no matter who he/she is.

Our work and thinking make us. It doesn‚Äôt mean where are you from, how you look, or which level you are‚Ä¶. it should give an equal judgment.

I want this. And for me, it seems that the world is against me.

I can‚Äôt contact my past people or future people. I am in my own era where I am supposed to be. In my generation all my people, understand me and I can understand them more than any other era/generation people can understand us.

Be unity, be strong, don‚Äôt fall apart. Yes not all of us are good but it is the responsibility of knowledgeable and strong people they make it as good as possible.

Look at the world and how it became. How every second, every hour we are spending.

title: Little joy of life
content:
Whom should I laugh at ?! I can‚Äôt believe I smile thinking about my own activities. If it would be I am smiling thinking about a guy, it might be I am in love with that man. But I feel happy being about myself, then maybe I am in love with who created me.

Amazing this is! Still, there is suffering, so many feelings that we don‚Äôt want, want to stay away from. But strange is how much we run from it the more we suffer until we accept it. At last, it was meant to happen.

I noticed people get some emotions toward someone but it‚Äôs totally different emotions when the same things are done by a person they know. Like if a strange person says, ‚ÄúYou look good‚Äù. We wonder why that person is asking this, and what is the intention because that person should not say any of those things.

I don‚Äôt know how much freedom we have, it is like you are by yourself now. Fight for yourself every moment, you are yours now we don‚Äôt care what happens to you. Anyone other than myself can be my enemy, the opposite party. That‚Äôs how much freedom we have. We have freedom so why are we suffering, it is still frustrating? Do we love to complain too much? Got it, so now the war portion left for inside of us, which we are too afraid to face. So afraid to fight or have a settlement. We are fleeing from ourselves.

BALANCING. Balancing, that‚Äôs what I want to say. We need a balanced diet. On food, relationship, activities, ‚Ä¶.. you know physical, mental, and spiritual.

So many complex emotions, thinking, understanding, and arguments‚Ä¶. come that much as we get older. It is hard to get proper decisiveness in any situation but for a good wiser person.

In our academics, careers, and race in life, we forget to learn about ourselves. Forget to see around us, listen, and think. Maybe this is happening to a foreign-educated engineer girl. Now when she sees a simple leaf she can just see that leaf with all curiosity, love, and pleasure for the whole day without being tired. Want to see the sky the whole night, just stare at it. Listen to nature. Look at insects, birds, animals, colors, flowers, fruits, plants, ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ everything is amazing. Eyes are not just for staring at a book or device. You can use it in many other ways too.

I don‚Äôt know if I am lazy or not but I like to see ants going. How they are doing their jobs, works. How they look. How birds fly, work, live. I want to just sit and observe. I don‚Äôt care if anyone thinks I am a boring person or an older person or lazy because I am doing nothing. Who can make that compliment, I can say please visit the doctor, you need treatment.

The problem is we need money to survive. Money can be earned easily if you can become mute, blind, or deaf. Poor aren‚Äôt allowed to be human. And the rich can‚Äôt be human. We are the ones who make those rules, we are the ones who complain about it, and we are the ones who reject the solutions. If it would be only one person It could be easily handled. But it is us. We are immature but arrogant, prideful, and too tied up.

What can we do? We have to play our roles, complete our responsibilities, and give the rights to the right person. Who said you have nothing to give. When you meet an older person you can give respect to them. When a child comes you can be playful and give love. When you have parents look after them, be patient, be nice.

We have nothing to give. What can I say to that poor soul? who likes to see oneself down, empty. Don‚Äôt make yourself a loser. When the creator made you as the treasure box.

title: Who is the real stupid ?
content:
Sometimes it happens that one stupid says to another stupid ‚Äúhow stupid you can be ?‚Äù üòÇ

You see I fell into a trap then moved round and round, illusions, confusions‚Ä¶ still I am. But when I see someone isn‚Äôt understanding a simple thing I say to that person without any hesitation ‚ÄúHow stupid you are ?! Be intelligent, wake up, bad guys are taking advantage of your good side‚Äù. If that person was me I would laugh and reply that the bigger stupid saying another stupid, a stupid.ü§£

But I am me. I can‚Äôt expect my behavior from others. Deep down I know how much hurt, and trouble comes from being so nice, na√Øve, and simple-minded. You see, bad guys are developing on the bad side every moment. And good guys developing on the good side. And when they meet each other it becomes a complex matter, literally blast. 

If you don‚Äôt have any defense system and have no knowledge of how to protect yourself, then you accept that your all precious thing you are just collecting and saving for the bad guys to come and take it. And then you will regret it, and be sad.

So, I don‚Äôt want anyone to get hurt like I got. So it is a love expression for my loved one who really knows me. A good person should be more energetic, and intelligent. If criminals become more intelligent than police then it is the place of daily crime where we are living. See how a bad person works too hard to do bad. So we should have developed ourselves more stronger and more intelligent. Good should be 10 steps ahead of bad.

Knowledge is power. The good and bad depend on its use. Police know how to do crime more than criminals but they use that knowledge for good. That is how they become good police officers.

But if I say to a person who is confused and has complex feelings for me, ‚ÄúYou are stupid‚Äù. That person will show confused feelings. Because already that person made an image of me and gave a my identity inside of him. That‚Äôs how he knows me. 

And for my enemy if I say, ‚ÄúYou are stupid‚Äù, don‚Äôt ask. It will be the same as declaring war, chaos, threat, insult, mock‚Ä¶.. üòÖ

Only from one sentence, I can find out too many people‚Äôs identities. Who is what? It‚Äôs amazing, isn‚Äôt it?

title: Silence
content:
Silence words which is better to keep secret and silent. Even though everyone is well aware of it.

Did you ever find yourself left out by another person‚Äôs silence?

The assertive reaction party knows what I meant.

Silence is a more effective killer than any other poison. It kills you quietly, and you don‚Äôt even realize what is going on. How did you reach this point! How did you turn out to be this!

You can understand when people speak the truth and when they lie. A liar never acts normal. They can‚Äôt. This is the law of nature. If it is not an open book then there is something worth hiding. If your instincts signal that there is something wrong, don‚Äôt dive to search for what is wrong. Just trust your instincts and secure yourself. Don‚Äôt take any chances.

If you don‚Äôt like the system you are in, you should bring a new system as you believe it should be, which is better than what it is now. Like if you don‚Äôt find any exit make it by yourself. There is no point in sitting there and describing all the facts. And If you can‚Äôt do that then you better get used to living in that system.

Everywhere all are gossiping, indicating how bad, and nasty this world and place is. Humanity, politics, economics, disasters‚Ä¶.. and we are sitting there and trying to solve it then making it worse afterward. Which is perfect for now, but it becomes worse on the other side. On the other side, some are sitting and judging how all is happening. Some memorize and are being educated, making themselves something but when that system changes whatever they believed in all the education, and efforts go to waste.

Why are we blaming, judging, and talking about something that will never be solved? That‚Äôs just causing us to hate this world, hate each other, and bring just hatred.

The world of shamelessness. We can keep improving or bringing something good, or happiness in here. Otherwise, just keep silent. Go with the flow, and ignore it keeping your head down. Being blind, mute, deaf, understandable lame, being like stone, like an animal, or even lower than an animal. That‚Äôs what we can do.

Who says we are developing, we are in the modern world! Then why still there is sadness, more complaints, and fear in truth, most of the place is full of illusions-lie and all know it. It‚Äôs really funny!

Sometimes not hearing the truth hurts more than being betrayed. All it is just telling the truth, yes it is what it is. Losing doesn‚Äôt matter. The matter is, ‚Äúnot getting an honest, truth statement‚Äù.

There is a saying, ‚ÄúA truthful enemy is better than a liar friend‚Äù. And I totally believe it.

Why should all the important, precious words be heard through the soul? Why can‚Äôt those be expressed any other way? Which do I want to know? I always heard from my inside?

So, that means all the outer words are just disguised. Truthfully, only that person can know who has an understandable mind, or soul. There is a mirror inside of every person. He/she sees all the reflections on that.

Don‚Äôt say please. Not any word. Only the confused person talks much. I love soul-to-soul connection. Let them have a chance to be connected. 

Can any mother/father express their true feelings in words to their child? All speech stops there. Even knowing 7 languages, people become mute. Can‚Äôt find any word from any language.

I know there is body language. A person can lie but body language doesn‚Äôt lie. It betrays you. I want to say, that you are the only one and most biggest betrayer of yourself. But I am afraid to read those messages. So the world has this responsibility to solve my problem, I don‚Äôt like handling the nasty anymore.

Sometimes love, care, respect, protection,‚Ä¶.. all good characters totally turn you down just the mistakes of handling those skills. Those good let think, see, hear, understand. Mess, hopeless‚Ä¶. that is how we get bad from bad. Otherwise good also brings good and bad brings bad.

Who doesn‚Äôt like children? cutie, little beautiful doll, hope-life renewal. We old people get a chance to see life from the start once more by being around children.

I can‚Äôt believe myself for being good I have to be excellent bad. To become a most kindest I have to be perfectly cruel. To love something I have to hate particular things most. To be the softest, kindest person I have to be too harsh, and hard on the opposite‚Ä¶ What‚Äôs this burden or easiness, I don‚Äôt know. The creator says it‚Äôs the perfect solution for us, the way of creation. Relief and release from the burden. The balance and combination of it, mastering this skill needs a lot.

What a great taste of life !!!

title: Pet
content:
I don‚Äôt want any bird to be forced to trust me, or forced to stay with me ever again.

Birds should be like birds, live as birds, and act like birds.

After all, I liked them when they weren‚Äôt caged.

Now when I see birds come to my window, I see life inside of them. Easy, comfortable, freedom. And that‚Äôs the bird I like.

Thanks to my lovely pets, for uncaging me and teaching me how to be a free bird.

title: Creation
content:
There are so many kinds of people in this world. Also, Lifestyles have so many differences. Like tree branches. You know in a classroom there exist so many students but one teacher. That teacher gives lessons only one way. But that lesson reaches in different ways to every single student. We get different grades, and some fail. Our parent says you have a head, eyes, hands, and legs all like the class topper why did you fail !!! Sorry Mommy/daddy to disappoint you, I tried my best but I am me and Topper is another individual being, he/she never can be me. That‚Äôs how we are. This is the beauty of Creation. We try our best and figure out what we are. There are so many options, probabilities, and differences. Enjoy it, learn from it. That‚Äôs was never our decision to make, never will be.

I am sure your parents didn‚Äôt know they would have a child for sure. We hope, We wish, We dream. We have freedom on that. But reality happens what The Creator wants. Also what kind of child he/she will be in the future. In every second, every moment we wait for surprises to come then we live that moment and prove ourselves who we really are.

One day we will die. But who knows when, where, and how he/she will die !!! What a surprise. If I knew that my life would be so much boring for sure.

We don‚Äôt have to know everything or discuss everything. There are limitations. A state‚Äôs development depends on how many heads/hands/legs/eyes/minds there are. I didn‚Äôt mean to be unknowledgeable. I am saying gain useful knowledge. If you can‚Äôt do anything with the knowledge or have no authority on that then It‚Äôs useless.

I can‚Äôt do sunrise or sunset. Bring the moon. Can‚Äôt have a curvy moon for all the time. Yes at our dinner table in the family, we do have so many quarrels about which food who wants, how much, how they want to eat, and how food should be. Among countries, if we give chances our own leaders can do non-stop debate till death. But no choice about the sun, We know it so well that we don‚Äôt debate about this issue. Who which sun wants, How it should be, which color, when it will rise or set, which one is wrong, which one is right.

That‚Äôs the creation. We have some free choices but from those free choices through so many struggles we learn that actually, we have no choice. All authority is upon the Creator‚Äôs hand.

I could have been born in 500 BC or 300 BC or In the future any century. But I was born in this century. I don‚Äôt know if was that my choice or not. But the interesting part is whichever century I would/will be born in, my life wouldn‚Äôt be perfect, never.

The earth. It has no fault. Don‚Äôt forget this is where we are born, living, and buried. It is under the Creator‚Äôs authority. Otherwise, the much we hate it insults being so shameless. For sure It would take revenge. Humans! see who are bad go away from my place, no birth, no living, no dying, nothing on me.

I feel powerless against a mosquito. Yeah if I have money we can buy that place where no insect will enter. But you have insects inside of you. Can you live without that?

In front of the mirror, I see myself I have bones and organs. All are working. I am not giving any instructions. I don‚Äôt tell my digestive system to do work. It does its work itself. My system will alarm me when I am hungry. But I have a choice Which food can I eat. Which food can I afford? That choice my body will not make. It is my choice according to my situation I will make that decision.

So when I am not giving any instructions to my body, I have no authority over it. I just clean it and keep it well so that I can do my job nicely until I die.

Spirit that is mine. But It has its own wish, hunger. Sometimes we feel empty and don‚Äôt know why we feel like that. Some strange feeling, something missing.

We want something good. Something out of the world. Who will understand us fully, Don‚Äôt have to say anything but will know everything, will never leave us what the situation is, 24/7 will be with us, will never be bored with us, will be so patient, never will be tired, Never will be offline, we are humans make mistakes but if I return with a solid apology will forgive us. Will love us doesn‚Äôt mean how we look like, how much prosperity we have, will see us as who we are‚Ä¶ Those all sound good right. Peace, Happy.

In spirituality, we have that wish. We search that for whole life. Start from Mother-Father-Siblings-Relatives-Neighbors-Friends-Lover-Life Partner-Childs-grandchild-strangers‚Ä¶ But in everywhere there is some emptiness, something less, something missing. That just does not fit what we want. Our whole life we discuss, become frustrated and regret how disappointing life is. We have to compromise it and get used to it. My wish is all just a fairy tale.

But no. If you want to see something by closing your eyes, you will not see it for sure. Here you are. Your dream came true. You are not searching for any human. Those characteristics don‚Äôt fit any human being. This is the existence which your soul knows very well.

You trust your instinct, don‚Äôt you? Ask yourself what it wants. And search for the things that fit those characteristics.

Don‚Äôt find something then try to fit your all wishes on that.

Follow the perfect sequence.

title: Acceptance
content:
Some things can never be explained to anyone. Accepted.

Our wishes will not come true just by listening to us as they do for imagination. Accepted.

Some kin never will be our kin except by name, blood connection, and bond. Accepted.

Why didn't I learn the truth since childhood? why didn't I know the truth about everything in life, surrounding me!

What was the necessity of that much love where in the end I will be spinning in the whirl of them! will ask me the same question a thousand times, which one is true and which one is false.

I know, I have to ask those questions only to myself, no one else will dare to listen or tell the truth. Silent, avoiding...

Did you think that I couldn't do that much for myself! As understanding came to me, I faced many things. 

Did you think that my silence meant that I didn't understand anything? 

As understanding came to me, I also have been reorganized.

What! Will tomorrow's me say that she doesn't know who I was yesterday, an illusion, a lie, or something else. 

Will Today's me say that tomorrow's me is non-existent being!

Me, only the present me, rest are strangers.

But yes, with all versions of us have some settlements that we have to maintain, otherwise the disaster will happen within me, and there will be no‚ÄÇone to stop it. Unless a wise, proper leader among me, takes my responsibility.

You don't give up, you don't despair, you don't give up. You are yours, you are your friends, true companions. 

I will fight for you, and make a treaty for you. I haven't forgotten our contract.

title: Inside strikes
content:
I am someone individual. I have my own wish, my own understanding, my own way of accepting which is what.

But when a perfect, calm person, accepting person starts her own step in life challenges, war starts from then.

Prove me where am I wrong, Just prove me with solid argument/solid proof. I will listen to you whatever it is.

My mind is not listening to me how can I make you understand that? It needs proof.

I do believe you. But now my mind wants to understand things by itself.

I am not being separated from you, never anyone will be successful in making me do it.

The bond among us is too strong. You all are in my memories and life.

I can never detach from you, never belittle you.

You don‚Äôt know how much higher place you exist in my heart.

That much hurt did I cause! But how am I wrong, Please explain to me I will listen to you.

My confidence, Self-image, and dreams have all been polluted by my own beloved person‚Äôs hatred.

I am alone, I am going crazy, I am being sick.

I am not blind, I know your love, your situation, your sacrifices, I know you. But here I have no one to talk to. I am sick. I want to be near you and warm love.

I am not at peace. I don‚Äôt compare you with worldly things. you are in a higher position in my heart.

Hard behavior, being strong, and motivational speech stories aren‚Äôt working for me.

Can‚Äôt you understand me? I am your kin. You are my closest kin in this world.

I know I shouldn‚Äôt say those, Those are cowardly talk And excuses for fleeing away.

But trust me I am broken from childhood. Please explain to me all the single topics I need to know.

I don‚Äôt need any luxury, jewelry, or shiny world. I want to‚ÄÇbe happy with all of you. I am not a runaway person.

I am sick, I am not well. And you are dreaming of me as the full moon, shining on the sky.

I know your happiness, hope, and dreams surround me. I am a shining star for you but I feel like I am lost in the deep of a black hole.

Listen to me, word by word what I tell you. I am not a coward, I am not making excuses.

I am not well take me and hold me strongly on you. Because you are the safest, most peaceful place, closest kin I have in this world.

Don‚Äôt tell me to be strong. Don‚Äôt give all motivational speeches. Don‚Äôt come to tell me how to be strong, warrior.

You didn‚Äôt know me at all.

All single moments of my life, dreams, and happiness gone polluted by hatred, nasty words, and behavior of my close loved people.

I illustrating, I am very sick, I am going crazy, I am confused. I am not making Jokes. Please don‚Äôt make fun of me.

Hear me out word by word as I say, every word by word. All I mean seriously.

Listen to me, look at me, I am not a coward. I am not giving any excuses.

Someone came to life at that crucial point. But that was the blast of a big tornado for a long time.

I need to know, I need to know. Please tell me.

I can‚Äôt study, I can‚Äôt do work,‚ÄÇI can‚Äôt live normally. I am broken, Can‚Äôt you see at all? My mind, my soul isn‚Äôt in peace. Don‚Äôt tell me I am ruining your all dreams, I am the reason for all those. I am no one for anyone because I am an individual human being.

You should have to support me, shouldn‚Äôt you?

I know I shouldn‚Äôt wish for anything, I shouldn‚Äôt ask anything. But I really need some peace, some love, some care.

I can totally see what is your condition. But you‚Äôre not aware I am not going through less than that.

I am not living in paradise. I am not in the perfect place.

Just talk to me politely, listen to me with respect, don‚Äôt be harsh. I don‚Äôt know. Teach me with love, care and respect.

I didn‚Äôt abandon anyone, You all didn‚Äôt understand me at all.

I don‚Äôt want any more fights, any more bad moments. Can‚Äôt you be happy and optimistic all the time? My happiness and life are bonded with you.

Ask me what you want to know, and I will be honest. You want an easy, comfortable life. Please give me proof I will be in the end according to your theory.

Hear me out word by word, listen carefully I mean all of it.

Please understand I am dying.

I am so tired of explaining and‚ÄÇfighting. I think I want my retirement too soon just to be happy, and smiley.

title: Selfish, I am!
content:
Men, You are amazing.

You work whole day, stay outside whole day, work whole day, interact with people and multiple situations.

Father is amazing they treat me as if I am his beloved princess. No filter is needed when you‚Äôre around me. I feel like a free bird in the sky. I am surprised How do you do that ?! So I also love you whatever you are, even if the whole world says you are bad. You are my hero. Always will be

Brother how amazing you are. I don‚Äôt have to think about myself, or anything when you are around me. Own portion you give me just to see my enthusiasm and become a warrior of my life. Most trustworthy warrior. Who knows magic and shows up whenever I need you before even I know that

My life, beloved husband how can I make you understand my love for you. I didn‚Äôt have to love any men before. I just fell into their love without notice. You fulfill all my wise, dreams. My life is completed with you. You are the balance of my life.

My son, how much I love you!!! How many dreams I saw, how much I thought, thousands of stories gone to my imagination surrounded by you. New life is coming through me ü•∞.

My grandchild, my old age‚Äôs new youth. Dates night, romantic stories with you.

I don‚Äôt know where I am.

My love just don‚Äôt show up.

I am just taking love always, I am really bad.

Living in paradise, I am the only one who is living the life. I don‚Äôt know how to be grateful.

I am the blind one, I don‚Äôt do anything, I don‚Äôt see all sacrificing your life for me. I am the queen, I am the princess.

When any of them came home, my happiness how spread in the air. And run off to see you leaving everything. Can‚Äôt wait for you to come to me.

What is this? You are so stupid my hero with a smile. I am just happy about your return, No need for those.

Can‚Äôt you stay longer ??

I am so selfish. All men are amazing. I don‚Äôt know how to show or do a thing, how to say I do that for that. Because it‚Äôs you my heroes you all are doing everything.

Making my world paradise. Sacrificing your own life for me.

I don‚Äôt know how to express love, I am not grateful still I don‚Äôt want to leave any of you.

I want to live my whole life through you, to have a nice happy life.

I feel happy, and joy around you even in your bad moments. My life is great, even when you are in stress, tension, problems‚Ä¶..

I am sorry for being like that, But my world is you. I just can‚Äôt want to leave it, even if I am the ungrateful, selfish one.

title: To my heroes
content:
You are the one who wants my happiness but you are also the one who can‚Äôt resist my happiness-joyful life,

I stay home, do life decoration, stay enjoy my life. Why do you feel so jealous of me?

I know you get tired, me too. But I still embrace that moment calmly and optimistically, why can‚Äôt you?

I think your every single thing is love but your heart is missing, head try to understand the logic. Suspicious of everything. Thinking all are taking advantage or have hidden purpose.

My heroes, you are the ones who are selfish. Want to run from responsibilities, want the reckless self world.

That fault goes to us, we mothers love children too much. But don‚Äôt teach children they have to love it back too.

We, girls, pass our time with that selfless female and learn that love is just giving everything, and accepting everything with happiness.

We are the ones who don‚Äôt care about how the father is, the father can‚Äôt miss them. The daughter will find him anyway and will spend time with him anyway. Even if it means being awake the whole night.

We are the ones if our brothers forget us still don‚Äôt forget them or cut the connection. We will find them, scold them, be angry but make them be with us.

title: Courage
content:
Name me the fear, I will surpass that at first.

Give me a doubt, I will be expert on that.

Tell me about, I will believe you.

Trick me, you will be tricked by yourself.

Show me the weak point, It will be the strongest side of me.

Try to forget me, You will never be able to do that.

The hardest and dearest things should be done at first.

Maybe that is why you focus more on those to become expert on it.

title: Knowledge
content:
Knowledge is power. Compliments over it depend on the use of it.

If it is on the right hand, in the right person, and handled the right way then it is right.

Otherwise vice versa.

No need to debate your whole life about chicken and egg. We eat both. Also, they are being produced.

And nobody asked us when they were created.

Relieve yourself, and be kind to yourself.

title: Learning
content:
No one can be truly good if they don‚Äôt know what is wrong clearly.

We learn both equally and become experts on both about knowledge.

Then we choose a side. Otherwise, the person is a robot nothing else.

There is no evil or peace learning. The point is the deed.

Also for the learner, don‚Äôt be that donkey who doesn‚Äôt know what he is carrying.

Al-Quran: Chapter 62: Jumuah, Verse: 5 [ The example of those who were entrusted with ÀπobservingÀ∫ the Torah but failed to do so, is that of a donkey carrying books. How evil is the example of those who reject Allah‚Äôs signs! For Allah does not ( guide the wrongdoing of people. (5) ]

I am sorry that knowledge is not from me. So I had to give the reference. I think we know about the referencing matter. I can‚Äôt say it is mine when it isn‚Äôt.

This author and teacher of it is the best.

title: Decision
content:
Convert the right decision to deed as soon as possible. Don‚Äôt ever keep it waiting for the right moment. When you realize it is right from that point all the moments become perfect for it. Now it is just all up to you.

And when you‚Äôre confused, write it all down. Then wait 7 days. Then if still you think it is okay step forward otherwise leave it.

You already know who you are, and what you want at that point.

title: Respect
content:
Being grateful is a great character you can build. Be grateful no matter what it is, no matter how small or big a good deed they did to you, be grateful. Say thanks with a satisfactory smile.

You will feel great. You will be nice, and gentle in your own eyes. And you will be able to respect yourself.

And Respect, that‚Äôs what I wanted to say about. Be respectful to everyone. Younger, Elder, good person, worse person‚Ä¶ Yes, there are laws and rights. Those who do wrong will get punishment but respect is something else. It is you, Not them.

Yes, I know it is too hard to do, I know it.

title: Big Bro
content:
My Big Bro, I always quarrel with him. From childhood, I am always been a fiery dragon.

My Big Bro never quarrels back with me. Always kept silent and smiled at me.

I never had to do any work at home, and Even if I insisted too hard, became angry. My Big Bro took all the work from me and did it himself.

I remember One day My brother told me he touched my lunch, and I didn‚Äôt eat it. My mother explained to me that was Jock many times. Still, I didn‚Äôt eat. He used to make too many irritating jocks to see my angry mood.

It is me. Everything needs to be separated, set accordingly as I want and no one can touch anything.

I remember I got two dresses on Eid with accessories, and my brother took me to the market to buy the dress. He didn‚Äôt get anything in Eid but didn‚Äôt say a word.

He replied how much I become angry, scold, insult him, and he will never stop talking to me. stop calling me, message me. Why do I have to be smiley always? It is too hard.

I am angry, temperance but I can see, hear, and understand. People make mistakes thinking, I don‚Äôt have any memories. Or maybe they miss me too much. love me too much.

My brother cried for me, Even I scolded him and told him don‚Äôt you have any shame just to make him leave me alone. I am too much broke please I want to handle my side by myself. I know you are more broken than me. And I want sometimes alone.

I know that is totally true. If I have any issue I have to become normal and smile at that moment no matter what. And He works too hard on it seriously. That is really hard to do. I have to be smiley, happy, and in a good position. That really irritates me sometimes, especially at a bad time.

He hated me when I bellowed myself. Surprise. I have no right to do that. I broke his heart, and I treated myself badly.

He becomes nervous when I am around because I make him feel I have been changed. And It is totally my fault, I became mature-elder.

Now I want to understand everything myself, love to do everything by myself, I want to think by myself. I am not that angry little doll anymore my big hero. I want to be someone in my sight.

I want to make mistakes, fall again and again, get hurt, and learn-understand everything by myself. I want to explore my life and live my life fully. Want to be responsible for my deeds, and make my own decisions.

No hurts, mistakes, burdens, or falling can stop me. Let me Explore my life. I am happy You all are with me.

So he hates me too much because he loves me so much.

That much is true we both know each other. We both care and love each other. But still, we have to fight to the death. That‚Äôs the sibling meaning.

I have so many heroes in my life, He is one of them.

title: Alive Dead
content:
Where did all the man gone,

Why in my eyes I only see dead people?

Does having breath means people are living? Hooray !!!!

So much education is stuffed in my head that I can‚Äôt even take a breath.

Are we making a robot or technology-system making us the robot?

Betrayers, and liars all over the world.

Being a good representative that‚Äôs all matter.

Ture is too tough to take.

We memorized so much and gained too much knowledge still as dumb as animals.

From where, where will I go

We live as dead and say in peace on death.

From where did I come, and where will I go.

How can I be sure death is the rest in peace !!!

Where I didn‚Äôt know how my world would be still shown up on time saying here I am.

Is it all about me for myself?

At which age do people get mature, and become responsible for their own act-decision ???

Don‚Äôt we feel tired of blaming others?

So weak we became, try to hide face, ignore all mirror.

Still, my image can‚Äôt hide from me.

Choose a side, and pick up your own identities, Achieve it.

You should work hard to achieve any badge.

Death is better than us at least they lost the authority to do anything in here.

So rest in peace, now we can‚Äôt fight anymore, our connection had been cut down,

And we are Alive-death searching for death to save us from this burden.

Why did we even come to this world in any way?

What kind of living is it where death is always kept hidden, frightened of facing the truth,

And what kind of peaceful death is it where being vanished, or being no one meant peace.

Too afraid to be coward, haven‚Äôt enough courage to be brave.

Some people really are worth staying in the museum,

I think the whole world is.

title: Midway 1
content:
Respect is not being silent and bowing head in front of elders and respectable people‚Ä¶

You will make a million mistakes if you think this, and obey this.

And at last, those people will turn their back and say why did you listen to us, follow us when you will be in trouble.

there are so many elders and people in respectable places but they are on the blacklist for crime‚Ä¶

This kind of person is an egoistic, prideful person who wants those. Want you to be treated as a false God, Not even a human well-wisher‚Ä¶

They don‚Äôt consider their deeds, never will look at it but will be there to judge when something doesn‚Äôt go as they wish.

No, I am not saying reject, disrespect the Worthy one, and respect, or accept the unworthy one.

You have to judge yourself who you are when you make any decision‚Ä¶

When you want to purify yourself and develop yourself there are so many tricks that will come to challenge you‚Ä¶

Show me is it really good? how?

Are you sure, you are not delusional?

Yes, I need those questions, and tricks to face to purify myself‚Ä¶

But it is also true that you are not purified yet keep that in mind‚Ä¶

There will questions come that the purified person is like that?

when you don‚Äôt know it well enough but want to be and love it, these questions will tear you apart‚Ä¶

Say, I am not the angle who doesn‚Äôt make any mistake or will never do it‚Ä¶

I don‚Äôt admit that, I am superior to any of you, But‚Ä¶

I choose to purify myself anyhow, even if it means mistakes, and ask forgiveness till my death breath‚Ä¶

I don‚Äôt choose any mistake-sin committed by me because I am well known that I can make mistakes and others can forgive‚Ä¶

Mistake-sin will be committed by me because human kind made this way, and will choose that redeem myself‚Ä¶

In my conscious mind, there will not be any mistake or sin Which I didn‚Äôt work strongly, passionately,

In my conscious mind, I didn‚Äôt follow the right way, didn‚Äôt try to redeem myself strongly with full of my strength, and didn‚Äôt ask for forgiveness correctly.

There will not be any fall when I never tried to stand up again, My creator gave me legs, mind for that‚Ä¶

There will not be any mistreat-behave which I will not work with my whole strength‚Ä¶

Yes, enemies are needed in life to reach to purify oneself‚Ä¶

I have many from fairly to extreme levels‚Ä¶

I trembled with fear of those, millions of fear‚Ä¶

Still, Please my Creator keep me on the right path, I am submitting myself to you‚Ä¶

title: Just
content:
Don‚Äôt choose an injustice person as your own. Even though they are injustice toward your most hatred enemy.

Why do people need to love so much which creates the most hatred in them?

It could be better to love as it needs to be. It is never love that takes away a human‚Äôs nature, manners, and virtue.

Be the lover even if we are separated and become bloodthirsty enemies. Still, your enemy can rely on you. Have faith that injustice will not come through you.

Be a human first then I will think about what you can be in my life.

Even if you are unjust toward my bloodthirsty enemy, I hate you.

For me, your unlimited love is nothing but a show-off.

That person is a good human who knows duty, and responsibility and is always conscious and wise. Don‚Äôt get overwhelmed by anything.

title: Hellish
content:
Some people deserve the hell. All pain, messy, bad things both in this world and after this life. Some deserve the hell of punishment without any question.

Surprising how Allah tolerates all of this, have patience. How could Allah do that knowing everything! Allah is really the most kind, and tolerance exists, There is nothing left but surrender to Allah when you understand clearly.

So leave them as they are. Allah will decide their fate. Duty has been finished, and judgment has been entered. Are you ready to get the fruits of your deed?

When Allah is the only guardian then everything is on to Allah. May Allah take all authority, My work is done. I am submitting my all suffering, complaints, and speech to Allah. I know Allah.

There is nothing left for me, I finished my duty.

One should get frightened when his all wishes, and opportunities come as heavy rain. You reach the extreme character to deserve what was prepared for you. You earned it all by yourself. You are the one who owns all.

And when all pain, digester come as rain. You find yourself in a breathless shrink place, good news is waiting for you.

There is no forgiveness for munafiq even though the prophet asked it seventy times. It‚Äôs forbidden for Muslims to ask forgiveness for munafiq. I surrender myself to Allah‚Äôs wish.

You can only be there where you get permission from authority. We so developed people know it very well. We just act dumb when it is time to take an exam. So educated we are for what we are so prideful.

Greed makes us living corpses. But accepted. Luxury which has magic, has power as drugs and alcohol everything blurred on that shine. Even own life.

Who cares about dead people‚Äôs speech, which doesn‚Äôt reach our ears. We love to have life being dead. Then we don‚Äôt have to feel anything. We are just inexistence. But From inside sound comes aloud who are you kidding?!

Some laugh at pious. Says, Does the Creator love you! then why are you in this condition? why the creator doesn‚Äôt protect you? give you so much suffer?‚Ä¶.. A peaceful smile comes from inside, ‚ÄúBecause Allah loves you too, So please don‚Äôt cross your limit, don‚Äôt make yourself worthy of deserve the hell‚Äù.

title: Human
content:
All are the same.

Which country, which nation, which culture, whatever you can think of.

Humans are human. They all are the same. You will find everyone in every place.

Once you realize it you will find yourself more than *100 years ahead of your actual age.

That‚Äôs the meaning of fully live. You learn all truth and false. Clearly understand everything. Time runs so fast for you that when you get 1000 years old you don‚Äôt realize a bit.

You know what happened, what is happening, and what will happen in the last all are clear.

That‚Äôs the age we are living. Fast speed.

Don‚Äôt fool yourself(at least you).

Nothing has been changed. It is all the same, just we know much now.

title: Warrior
content:
What‚Äôs a Lady? I don‚Äôt know.

What‚Äôs a women ? does I don‚Äôt care.

I am a fiery dragon, lioness of the forest.

I learned myself. She will not break, she will not stop, she will not bow.

She is a warrior. Her peace, and happiness in living life is that.

I don‚Äôt care who, or what will think or do for me or anyone else. But I will do that for sure. I will not stay silent no doubt.

Even If I need to fight against all of my own people. Or any enemy. If you are someone who has courage for that only that person can be with me. Otherwise, my creator is enough for me.

Fistfight or debate or journey of any dark forest my life is being a warrior. The fiery dragon, the lioness.

That‚Äôs the meaning of life, that‚Äôs the meaning of living, that‚Äôs the meaning of having breath. That‚Äôs me.

I don‚Äôt need any prince charming or warrior to rescue me.

Being a very bold, brave, daring, courageous, stubborn, rebellious, and headstrong girl. That‚Äôs me.

The customs, traditions, and all social restrictions. What‚Äôs that?! Don‚Äôt bring any stupidity.

‚ÄúI will not even ask anyone for my OWN ownership!‚Äù‚Äï‚ÄÇ

That‚Äôs me. Being free spirit.

title: Gems
content: Behaviour or characteristics education is totally different from professional or career education. That‚Äôs why nowadays many can earn but doesn‚Äôt have any idea how to live

title: Some Adventures of Life
content:
What‚Äôs life, if there is no adventure?!

All the adventures and changes are the witness to time passing.

I am not perfect. I will never be. Sometimes maybe clumsy, sometimes a crazy girl, sometimes an angry bird, sometimes as a fiery dragon, sometimes as a baby, sometimes as a warrior, sometimes as a wished oldest grandmother.

I will not be the same always. Sometimes as shiny as the moon, sometimes in the darkest place, sometimes in the most Maddy-easiest ways with all untidy hair-untidy dress, sometimes maybe as cheerful, sometimes just looking and being by myself.

The person who deserves a better position and who also conditions all conditions and embraces them all is there for me.

I don‚Äôt know If I am a psycho or not. But If the condition is that all humans are hypocrites, then no need to waste oneself on useless things. Or accept something wasteful over emotional blackmail. Or wishing a miracle to come in the specific time condition and make oneself crazy depressed being betrayed.

Yes, eyes are for sight, crying, or many other signs. Also, material/doorway to get hurt. The same goes for everything you have or owned. All are precious things, know the value of everything. Please give them the respect, value, and protection they deserve.

title: Living
content:
Should I say sorry to that person who was a companion of my sin? Or accuse that person for consciously taking me to the dark place?

Truth never stays hidden. Today, 10 years later or 100 years later that will come to the light.

I think I should just leave that person and continue on my own journey. And ask forgiveness from Almighty Allah. Allah kept that knowledge hidden and brought it to light which makes me feel regretful. That fire, heat, and strike can make the heart soft.

And now my world isn‚Äôt the same as before. It will never be like before. Journey, time is for that. Those are the keys to the new world.

Live long. Live fully. Yes, it is possible to live the same as 1000 years in 30 years.

Child? No children are those who haven‚Äôt started their life yet. Or didn‚Äôt reach the point of having access to life fully. But day by day, second by second they are reaching to that point.

That adult who wants to return back to childhood. I think they are so exhausted about their life and want to go away from their life, and everything.

title: Changing
content:
When I was far away from my country, I realized that I was nothing. When I returned from abroad to my own home country, I realized that in my own country, all people have mental problems. After that when I went back to abroad again and returned to my home country again, I realized my people were so intelligent. Then again when I returned back to my home country from abroad I was someone important, they needed me, and I needed to stay on the soil where I was born.

There are so many questions from that perspective. And answer, That depends on the person and his/her personality.

In my own opinion, if I have the identity of being truthful then I also should be truthful about myself. That is also part of truthfulness, isn‚Äôt it? 

Whatever deed is good or bad, its understanding starts from the self. Experiment material for me is myself.

If I should hide from my own person, how could they become my own people! 

Sorry, I don‚Äôt want to hurt anyone. But unfortunately or fortunately that is the rule of our creator. There are so many variances, always ups and downs. We are not perfect, sorry to me, I was asking for a heavenly environment when I am in the world. 

We need to work for those. Need to prove to yourself that you are worthy of it. And the beautiful thing is that your efforts affect you more than outsiders.

title: Light as feather
content:
They say what does good teach you?!

They say does good provoke you to hate?! then what is the difference between you and bad? You both have the same identity.

They say why good people suffer, why good people aren‚Äôt at peace?!

They say it is a hallucination, lies which I make myself believe.

They say if I am that much good why can‚Äôt I solve world all problems?!

They say where are your good deed and good companion, why doesn‚Äôt they save you from your suffering?!

They say why the good are coward?! They are stupid. They make themselves suffer and bring suffering around them.

They say why good need any protection?! need anything at all. Doesn‚Äôt good is enough for them to survive?!

They say Why did good make you more depressed?!

They say good are gloomy and results are out of sight.

They say If you are that much sure then why did you leave good?!

They say why did you listen to us, why didn‚Äôt focus on your deed?! You had more knowledge than us. Don‚Äôt blame us. If you are so eager to blame someone then blame yourself.

They say good needs to be good and bad will be bad. But good also being bad this way. And we are confused.

They say Good need to have most vulnerable to get hurt and have to be most inactive.

I am happy Good-Bad‚Äôs identity isn‚Äôt sealed from you. I am just so grateful for feeling light and getting peace.

title: My lovely mother
content:
I am in debt for all your sacrifice, suffering, and deeds my respected lovely mother. I haven‚Äôt enough anything to get rid of any debt even a single breath of you. My full of heart gratitude, love, and respect towards you.

But My lovely mother you didn‚Äôt create me. My skin, my any organ nothing is created by you. Yes, you bear me. But my past, present, future, fate you are not aware of anything not anything is in your hand. Yes, your satisfaction means too much for my life, fate, past-present-future. And all those respect, higher position of you set by the Creator. The Creator who created you and me. The Creator who created the Earth, Sky, and everything between them.

Which thing didn‚Äôt give me you have no authority to destroy or force me to do it using blackmail of your high position.

My lovely mother don‚Äôt kill me. Don‚Äôt choose any bad daddy for me. Please don‚Äôt destroy my childhood, don‚Äôt bring trauma to our life, don‚Äôt kill anyone. My lovely mother you are a position of that. Please protect yourself. Guard yourself.

Choose a good life for you so that I can have a good life too. Take care of yourself you are my place on earth. Love yourself, and treasure yourself you are so important not only for yourself but for so many lives.

My lovely mother. Please be your guardian for your own sake for my sake for lots of life‚Äôs sake. You are the beauty of the world. Bearer of new generation, builder of humanity manhood. Know yourself, give yourself proper value for real. I don‚Äôt want to be neglected. Mother climb high, learn and take us to high, teach us. Show us the world through you. Don‚Äôt lie. Mothers are higher degree personality persons, the most brave person. Please choose truth for yourself and also show us the beauty of truth.

When you are weak I am weaker. When you are traumatized I am in worse condition. You are not just for yourself, You are a world. Gateway of a different world. Soul comes to you. I do rise be a human being. My lovely mother you never is alone. Don‚Äôt through yourself anywhere or anyone. You are one of the best personality person to me.

title: Freedom
content:
No pain no gain. Yes, that‚Äôs truth.

From your childhood, you understand what will be your aim in life. You get the same incidents in so many ways from everywhere. All come over you like that way you forced to say, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs enough. I need to breathe, I have to breathe or I should make it finished right now.‚Äù

Yes, all kind of test will come to you. To give you chance to pass the exam. Write down all thoughts, all words, all deeds all will be examined until you win or give up.

All comes like a cyclone. The speech comes out like a storm. But when wishes come true all is calm. No word left to say anything. Yes, all wishes will come true.

Empty pot moves even in a breeze. Become crazy without knowing what is happening over all.

Did you live a long life? Huh, your existence is the proof. Let‚Äôs live, let‚Äôs move, let‚Äôs solve. Only let it happen in the right way on justice. That‚Äôs all I want.

title: Your Story
content:
Sometimes no one can reach you to help you no matter how much they try,

You are the one who should rise, stand up for rescue yourself.

No, it is not any tragedy story, it is your life story. Which parts see as tragedy or so afraid to think of,

Again, when you stand up being healed. You have to smile peacefully at those who hurt you at a bad time and say how are you, is everything ok?

No, it is not any hurtful story. It is your story.

Again, you have to go to them again and again to listen and help them. Who didn‚Äôt even listen to you a bit and rejected you over and over when you were extremely broken.

No, it‚Äôs not any broken heart story. It‚Äôs your story.

It is you who get raised again and again. Called it a pitiful, tragic story. Shown you as a weak and helpless being.

Until you believe, it is your story.

No, I am not saying there are no bad people around us or we don‚Äôt need others.

I meant to be someone to yourself. Be Someone special in your story rather than always being rescued or being wronged by others.

title: Ashamed
content:
Don‚Äôt be ashamed of what Allah made halal.

Don‚Äôt be ashamed of being a housewife.

Don‚Äôt be ashamed to take care of family, and children, and have an Islamic life.

Don‚Äôt be ashamed to touch old mother-father feet in public. Being scolded by them.

Don‚Äôt be ashamed of your own face or color. Don‚Äôt hate yourself‚Ä¶

Don‚Äôt be ashamed to eat halal food.

Don‚Äôt be ashamed to wear a halal dress.

Don‚Äôt be proud/reckless of what is not yours.

Allah gives you those. Don‚Äôt insult Allah. Don‚Äôt belittle Allah. All are Allah‚Äôs. Know Allah. You are not yours, who are you?! A servant nothing else.

Yes, you are so weak.

Don‚Äôt start the war against Allah. Surrender or you will be surrendered for surely.

Shame. Of course that feeling is also halal for us. But that shame gives love, good, nice, pious, great feeling.

We Muslims know how to feel, how to talk, how to think, how to see, how to hear‚Ä¶.. everything Allah had taught us.

title: Blindfolded Arrogant!!!
content:
Debate and Debate.

Argument after argument.

Never ending conversation.

I am not going to accept you neither want to listen to you.

I don‚Äôt want any logic, proof.

I am just giving you chance to accept me to understand me.

Look how good I am ! How kind I am !

I am waiting to accept me if you really want me.

I could be more reckless, unkind, cruel‚Ä¶

But I am not like those bad people.

Ain‚Äôt I good? wroth to be respected?

I keep silent even though you talk for ten years, became creazy on self talk over drown on millions thinking, overwhelm. I did nothing. I didn‚Äôt leave you.

I waited for you to understand that I don‚Äôt care whatever you say, whatever you think or believe whether it is good or bad‚Ä¶

This is you who is precious to me, I want you.

I did that much, to treat you that much still you are so ungrateful to me‚Ä¶

Don‚Äôt see whom you are going to lose‚Ä¶

There are too many bad people out there, I am not like them‚Ä¶

How dare you compare me with them, even worse than them‚Ä¶

You truly are ungrateful, don‚Äôt deserve me.

You should see the world without me, and the true face of the world.

I also wonder who will even sit beside you who just explain day-night for 10 years.

You are really a loser.

content:

When you are upset

I show you the path, It is totally up to you which way you choose.

title: Flew
content:
When you want to know the truth and all the sources are liars, betrayers. And others are fleeing. Then one wish just left, I wish I never met those people and had a single millisecond with any of them. I am better off with any of them.

Of course, Allah will save me and give the better for my suffering and all those Dua. I believe in Allah. Maximum Humans are cowards. Have everything as humans but have nothing at all when it comes to real shows.

I think those people didn‚Äôt face that side of life.

title: Freedom
content:
Freedom doesn‚Äôt mean that anyone can do or say anything whatever they want.

It‚Äôs means any people can say or do right things without any fear.

That‚Äôs the freedom I want.

title: Life
content:
In Turkey, I loved Istanbul, my university campus Davutpasa, the sky, the ocean, and the seashore. Sweets, some food, and rain in every season, or weather.

I hated snow(It looks great to see being inside a heated room, but too cold), and transport(too crowded. feels like smash human. I wasted so much time on that.)

I met so many people from different countries and so many people from different cultures. Indonesians are great people. I miss so many people.

Istanbul was a crowded place. Busy time. But I was so lonely. Even I was so eager to get simple to so simple things from Bangladesh and my Family Like love, attention, being someone special, getting angry with someone, getting a hug from someone, and having a heartful conversation‚Ä¶.. No, no one will understand what I am saying until they become myself.

I need to be here where I belong. I want to be at home, with you, Please take me home. I know what we need. I got the medicine.

People don‚Äôt understand why a foreign-educated engineer is so eager to learn, wants to know the truth, will read books or research‚Ä¶.. they should earn money. That‚Äôs why she cost so much. Otherwise, you are nothing more than a burden. It‚Äôs ok.

Abroad is a nice place, a developed environment, money, and money‚Ä¶.. right but those are not mine. You will earn for yourself and also for so many people. But I want peace, I want to be happy can those give me peace or happiness? Yes, I know money gives easiness and freedom.

If you choose a different path then the only one left to blame for is you. I am happy being a homey travel-lover girl who took the universe as her school, Almighty Allah as a teacher and she loves her teacher and her school both so much.

I am so a choosy person I need nice, pure things‚Ä¶.. I need all the useful great knowledge. I want too much riches which will give me freedom. And I want to be the wisest happiest young person forever who is in peace.

title: Peace
content:
When you get angry and make some mistake then regret severely. Ask for forgiveness continuously for forever.

Then the person says it‚Äôs normal to make mistake when you are angry. It feels awesome. Just awesome.

When you are sad. Speak messly and do all work messly. And the person beside you hear everything attentively and support you. When you get tired give a warm hug and say i understand you, i understand how much hard it is for you. It gives peace as cold breeze after big stormy night.

When you are so happy that you mess up yourself. And someone become as mess up as you. But actually don‚Äôt know why are you that much happy yet. And after long time pass when you are calm ask you, ‚Äúhey why were you that much happy, what happened‚Äù ? It gives much happiness than earlier.

title: Worthy
content:
If you are proven unworthy. Make yourself worthy rather than make someone else responsible for your unworthiness.

Don‚Äôt release your own weakness, or depression on a loved one and make it worsen.

Maybe a loved one will still be with you but deep down everyone knows what you are worthy of.

It is not what others judge, it‚Äôs what you judge.

title: Life
content:
Not all people are brave.

Not everyone will tell truth.

Some will not be held obligated to do right.

And it‚Äôs ok.

It‚Äôs totally fine.

Life is a business.

We all are businessman.

title: Special life
content:
Life is fantastic.

Nothing here is static.

Everything is changing, including myself.

The me of a minute ago is not the same as the me of right now.

And I love the rules of life though sometimes it is troublesome.

Maybe not now but tomorrow or the next day or the day after next‚Ä¶.. But one day I will learn it all, and be perfectly used to it.

And there is too much difference between the Duniya world and the afterworld. The perfect world is the afterworld. May Allah grant me success in both worlds. Because I love perfectionism.

Life, you hold too much precious treasure for me. So I keep you in my treasure box so that it preserves its specialty and doesn‚Äôt get scammed.

title: Life Rules
content:
Nothing in this world is free. If there is no price tag or it is free then be cautious about what it will take. Cause it will take much more than you think. Maybe your honor, or your soul, or your peace, or your time, or maybe your life.

Equivalent exchange for everything. If you understand a section of life, apply it. See how it changes from time to time. Karma is true. Whatever you will do, it will come back to you. Its control is in the creator‚Äôs hand. No creation can change it. If you do good and others wish bad to happen to you. It will not happen. Their wish doesn‚Äôt matter, it‚Äôs your deed and the creator‚Äôs wish that matter. But if you do good and others also wish good things happen to you. Of course, good was about to happen to you but now will be better for other people good wishes and clean heart pray.

Life sometimes seems easy and sometimes too hard. It is easy when you are happy and in peace. And it is hard when you are going through a bad time. But keep in mind life is both good and bad. It is the rule of life that good and bad will come one after another. As day and night change bad times will pass and good times will come as always. But don‚Äôt just sit down to pass the time because time will solve your problem. It costs too much than you can afford.

Our life is not a simple algorithm. It is too much complex. You can‚Äôt say 1 plus 1 equals 2 always happen in real life. Sometimes it is 2, sometimes 0, sometimes millions. It depends upon so many facts. It‚Äôs not mathematics it‚Äôs Life and it has its unique special rules.

title: Life logic
content:
For everything, there should be unique rules and logic. If right and wrong are different from person to person it will be chaos. There will be no safe place or person to be or interact with. Of course, there are unique rules and logic.

But still, for some, you shouldn‚Äôt search for logic. Because some don‚Äôt want logic or understanding right or wrong at all. You will be mad if you try that. Because their world is totally different than yours or how it should be. The only place where they are forced to accept the rules and logic is where laws apply and there are punishments for going outside of line. But no law can stop them. Humans are reckless beings. And some people call it freedom.

Freedom doesn‚Äôt mean that anyone can do or say anything whatever they want. It means any people can say or do the right things without any fear. That‚Äôs the freedom we want.

For some don‚Äôt try to explain. Because some never will understand. On the contrary, they will blame you and hurt you. Leave them. Ignore them. Trustable people achieve trust, don‚Äôt try to manipulate people and take advantage.

If you are proven unworthy. Make yourself worthy rather than make someone else responsible for your unworthiness. Don‚Äôt release your own weakness, or depression on a loved one and make it worsen. Maybe a loved one will still be with you but in deep down everyone knows what you are worthy of. It is not what others judge, it‚Äôs what you judge.

Some say you should solve problems. What is the point of solving the problem if we create it again and again? Why shouldn‚Äôt we do something so we don‚Äôt have any? And use those times on something good to move forward in life. Though it‚Äôs a good word just think permanent solution but it‚Äôs temporary and circular. Nothing is static in this world neither any problem or not any solution.

Life is fantastic. Nothing here is static. Everything is changing, including myself. The me of a minute ago is not the same as the me of right now. Though sometimes it is troublesome, its rules are really interesting. Maybe not now but tomorrow or the next day or the day after next‚Ä¶.. But one day we should learn it all, and be perfectly used to it. Otherwise, life is too tough. Life holds too much precious treasure. So you should keep it in your treasure box so that it preserves its specialty and doesn‚Äôt get scammed.

If you think your work will help someone else. And someone else will solve your problem. You are the reason you are in trouble. Who can help someone who doesn‚Äôt help himself? You are on your own. It‚Äôs your freedom to choose a side.

Not all people are brave. Not everyone will tell the truth. Some will not be held obligated to do right. And it‚Äôs ok. It‚Äôs fine. Life is a business. We all are businessmen.

title: Humans change, and so does the decision
content:
Humans change, and so does the decision.

Now I love you, I can‚Äôt say if I will love you the next moment.

Knowledge level changes, and so does wisdom.

I am stupid now, you can‚Äôt say I will not be wise in the next moment.

Maybe wiser will be stupid for destiny cause.

Newly I will meet you again and again each time we meet.

Time passes, days pass and people also change. Changes his understanding, knowledge, desire, dream, taste‚Ä¶ So what is the previous me, is not me? No, it is not. It‚Äôs a part of me. I wonder how many versions I have. Is that me?! 

The theory of relativity comes to mind.

Can a thousand years be live in ten years? Yes, it can be. Even in one year, it can be passed. There is no end of knowing. There is no end to learning. I love myself very much for being me. Even more than that, I love the one for whom everything is possible. For whom I am, I am me.

Yes, I am a faulted ordinary person. And I want to make up for my flaws with goodness.

title: Why do those nasty live in this world ?!
content:
Why does nasty exist in this world ?! I hate this world because of them. They are like poison. Hit you as a poisonous snake. You can‚Äôt ignore them all the time. It is impossible to have a place without them. We have to co-exist with them. No matter what, we have to take them as part of society. Not all societies do justice. This world bears too many sicknesses, and poisons. Greedy, desire, power, fame, shamelessness, falsehood, ‚Ä¶ How can you cure or heal this world ?! This world is meant to be like this for the whole time. No way to discuss this. It is not a curable sickness. Better learn to live with that.

We can‚Äôt always feel hatred and live a life! It is causing our mental illness. We are facing hypertension, anger issues, ADHD, anxiety disorder, depression, bipolar disorder, post-traumatic stress disorder, eating disorder, Schizophrenia, Disruptive behavior and dissocial disorders, So many mental issues. Can you believe that, we are letting the nasty world co-exist with us and we are the ones who will face mental sickness? This world has gone crazy!

We are giving them a chance to change and in the end, they just mock us! How good are you, you are just a stupid person! This world wasn‚Äôt meant to be healed by us. It will not be cured. Not the nasty people will turn into mind-blowing good people. It has never been our duty to convert this world into a paradise. Because it won‚Äôt be. We can‚Äôt change any person. We just can do our own job. Take our decision. And leave the world at its place be chill.

If you are not one who is any harm then it is ok. Sound like a cowardly lazy person. But what can we do we can‚Äôt fight with air. But you are making us more uncool people. Who did say that ?! You have to be a cooler person. A hot temper will not bring you any fortune. You have to keep sharp yourself for the whole time, you will be ready for just a second chance to act.

This world is not ours even though it is for us.
